title: SENATOR JOHN McCAIN URGES VA SECRETARY TO RECONSIDER SELECTION OF NEW SOUTHWEST REGIONAL VA DIRECTOR ...
text: ( Source : John McCain ) Washington, D.C. - U.S. Senator John McCain (R-AZ) sent a letter to Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Secretary Robert McDonald today urging him to reconsider the selection of Skye McDougall as the new director of
